::DrillBit::

Drillbit looked into her eyes. 
"How do you feel, my love? We need to get out there. The base is under
attack."

::K-9::

K-9 kept shooting at the Pred cave. He saw Phobia's ship raise to the
sky.
"Holy shit!" He raised his rifle, and started shooting at the ships
weopons. He hoped the shields would fail.
